revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Pine64 |model=ROCK64 |revision=(4GB) V2.0 |asin=B076N3G3WS |price=45 |est_release_date=6/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.35 |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3328 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=SpecTek |ram1_model=SM1G32V91MD4LMZ-125BT |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eMMC module socket, |expansion_usb_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1; ,,, Stereo Line Driver w/ Adjustable Gain;SG Micro;SGM89000;;1; |flags=HDMI 2.0a, A/V out (3.5mm), GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |oui_eth=5A:D4:3C }} {{TagLine|ROCK64 4K60P HDR Media Board Computer}} :[https://www.pine64.org/devices/single-board-computers/rock64/ Product Page]
"Designed in Silicon Valley, California. Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "ROCK64 V2.0" and "2017-0713" is silkscreened on board.
*[http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64_Main_Page On '''Pine64''' Wiki] So far there are three different models: :• ROCK64 (1GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (2GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (4GB DRAM)
{{See also|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3328 @1.5GHz 64-bit :Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A53) Processor *GPU: Mali-450 MP2 (supporting 4K @60fps) :Video decoding via VP9 or 10-bit H265/H264 *Flash: 128MB (SPI), RAM: 1/2/4GB (LPDDR3) *Ports: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) LAN (RJ-45) :2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB 3.0 Host ports :microSD Card slot, eMMC module socket, :40-pins GPIO header, A/V out (3.5mm) jack *Physical Power / Reset / Recovery buttons *IR Receiver; Linux or Android available *Size: 85 x 56 x 18 mm, Weight: 40g
===See also=== *[[PINE A64+ 2GB]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE A64-LTS]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64-LTS/SOPine_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model A]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Model-A_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model B (3GB)]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE ROCK64 (4GB)]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64 MPage] *[[PINE ROCKPro64]] •[https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCKPro64 MPage]
